post:
Hello there,

As many of you missed out our first offer (from here https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/81917/one-year-of-free-webhosting-at-hetnix), here we are, again, offering another year of free webhosting.

For anyone in need of webhosting, you can get the "Advanced" plan (you need to select yearly billing scheme) for FREE with no obligation of renewing it after the free year.

Promo code: FREEZETHEWEB

Order now: https://www.hetnix.com/webhosting.xml

Promotion is available only for 50 lucky users and it is available only once per new customer.

Please note that:
<pre>
- All orders are validated by a human staff member (aka no auto-provision), to prevent frauds.
- You MUST own the domain name you are ordering webhosting for. No dummy (or remote) domains are allowed (such as google.com, domain.com, asddsa.asd ... etc).
- If you spam, use it for pishing or any iilegal and fraudulent activity, your account will be terminated. Permanently.
</pre>

Thank you,

Andrei.
